Feature.Name: Potion of Resistance (Acid)
Feature.Text: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to acid damage for 1 hour.

MagicProperty.Name: Potion of Resistance (Acid)
MagicProperty.Description: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to one type of damage for 1 hour. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below. d10: Damage Type 1: Acid 2: Cold 3: Fire 4: Force 5: Lightning 6: Necrotic 7: Poison 8: Psychic 9: Radiant 10: Thunder
